property.name: doslocos.harvester.frequency.collect
property.description: minimum path frequency needed to survive a clean up. nodes with more paths are considered common

property.name: doslocos.harvester.frequency.write
property.description: minimum path frequency needed to be considered for storage

property.name: doslocos.harvester.frequency.max
property.description: minimum path frequency needed to for node to stop counting paths

property.name: doslocos.harvester.frequency.gc
property.description: minimum path frequency needed before gc gets triggered

property.name: doslocos.harvester.fieldname
property.description: name of a field that would be used to index filtered data. this field should exist in the schema.

property.name: doslocos.harvester.remove_fileds
property.description: the fields that you want to remove entirely in Indexing part

property.name: doslocos.harvester.cache.hosts_per_job
property.description: upper average of number of hosts in a given fetch job

property.name: doslocos.harvester.cache.nodes_per_page
property.description: upper average of number of nodes in a given page

property.name: doslocos.harvester.cache.load_factor
property.description: cache load factor in float

property.name: doslocos.harvester.storage.class
property.description: for mysql : com.doslocos.nutch.harvester.storage.Mariadb for redis : com.doslocos.nutch.harvester.storage.Redis

property.name: doslocos.harvester.storage.test_host
property.description: runs a set of tests using the mentioned host data

property.name: doslocos.harvester.mariadb.host
property.description: its Mariadb host address

property.name: doslocos.harvester.mariadb.schema
property.description: its the name of your database in the sql

property.name: doslocos.harvester.mariadb.username
property.description: its database username that you must add in your sql

property.name: doslocos.harvester.mariadb.password
property.description: its database password you must change it for connection to database

property.name: doslocos.harvester.mariadb.poolMaxTotal
property.description: maximum number of concurrent connections

property.name: doslocos.harvester.mariadb.poolMaxIdle
property.description: maximum number of connection to keep around in case

property.name: doslocos.harvester.mariadb.readBatchSize
property.description: number of nodes to be read in each batch

property.name: doslocos.harvester.mariadb.writeBatchSize
property.description: number of nodes to be inserted in each batch

property.name: doslocos.harvester.redis.host
property.description: hostname

property.name: doslocos.harvester.redis.port
property.description: Redis port number

property.name: doslocos.harvester.redis.dbTimeOut
property.description: time out in seconds

property.name: doslocos.harvester.redis.db
property.description: database number

property.name: doslocos.harvester.redis.setTestOnBorrow
property.description: refer to jedis pool configurati

property.name: doslocos.harvester.redis.setTestOnReturn
property.description: its the number of your database in Redis

property.name: doslocos.harvester.redis.setTestWhileIdle
property.description: its the number of your database in Redis

property.name: doslocos.harvester.redis.setMaxTotal
property.description: refer to jedis pool configuration, should be, at most, as big as the number of fetcher threads

property.name: doslocos.harvester.redis.setMaxIdle
property.description: refer to jedis pool configuration
